ValidationRule.description: Only Doc Desk Pilot Users can pick the Submitted to FSS/VSS Status when the Opportunity Type is Payroll
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Pending - Submitted to VSS'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Sold - Submitted to FSS')), ISCHANGED(StageName), OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c ,'Payroll')),NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT($User.User_Type__c),'Doc Desk')),ISBLANK(TEXT($User.User_Type__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Doc Desk Pilot Users can pick the Submitted to FSS/VSS Status when the Opportunity Type is Payroll
